name: Undead-Space
description:
This is my 2D shooter project.

Modifications:

1)Reskinned all enemies, environment elements, UI and player to a new style, also added UI for lives.

2)Made three new sound tracks for title screen and levels.

3)added the ability to dash using space bar, added three different power-ups to buff fire rate, damage, and lives.

4)Made three unique, coherent levels with a story.

5)added destructible environment.

Made by: Ziad Ashraf
